title: 125 - The Unexamined Carl
description:
A dire call in from an ex-believer who had one too many fiber-one bars. Livy burps. Luke is open about his emotions and scavenges for everything in the Hawkins household (except banana laffy taffy). A theological debate ensues, culminating in Heather’s pronouncement of the best chick-fil-a sauce. Crappaw calls in to tell the gang he loves them and that he still has awful bowels!
  Thanks to FaithfulCounseling for sponsoring this episode. Go to  https://faithfulcounseling.com/timhawkins for 10% off of your first month of counseling!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
